Today the new postnatal period of 6 months came into force, until yesterday it only favored 1 of every 3 working mothers, today it is a right of all.
This postnatal benefits families and women, stimulates motherhood and breastfeeding and strengthens the health of newborns.
This extended postnatal incorporates additional benefits for mothers who have premature children, multiple births or adopt children.
